Class Clique

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.smrf.model.Clique
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CascadeClique, ConstrainedClique

    public class Clique
extends Object
    A clique in a MRF.
    Author:
    Don Metzler, Lidan Wang
